page.title: 02PRESENT DAY FLEET
page.content: Fleet is a modern town which did not exist before the Railway Station was built. The town possesses a new civic centre and new administrative offices are being built. There is a good shopping centre with many small family concerns and a Saturday market. On the outskirts is a small light industrial estate. Many new housing developments are taking place because of the easy {access to London.}At least four different companies have purchased land along the road between Fleet and Cove and there is worry about the{loss {of open space.}Within the town there are very many amenities for the public to enjoy; football, cricket, hockey, tennis and golf are all well catered for although the town does lack a swimming pool.{Churches}of most denominations exist here.
